game.name: Rod of Asclepius
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Custom Volume Controls, Mouse Only Option, Playable without Timed Input, Save Anytime, Stereo Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Rod of Asclepius is a historical RPG in 4th-century Pannonia. Play a Roman medicus: investigate symptoms, gather herbs, and perform turn-based treatments. Explore researched sites and make ethical choices that shape your reputation as the empire falters.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Rod of Asclepius is a historical RPG in 4th-century Pannonia. Play a Roman medicus: investigate symptoms, gather herbs, and perform turn-based treatments. Explore researched sites and make ethical choices that shape your reputation as the empire falters.
